subject: Baseball
Free Agents (Sports)
lead_paragraph: The free-agent reliever J. C. Romero re-signed with the Philadelphia Phillies yesterday, agreeing to a three-year, $12 million contract. Romero had a 1.92 earned run average with the Phillies and the Boston Red Sox last season.
snippet: The free-agent reliever J. C. Romero re-signed with the Philadelphia Phillies yesterday, agreeing to a three-year, $12 million contract. Romero had a 1.92 earned run average with the Phillies and the Boston Red Sox last season.
